name: A Wizard's Fight
description:
Description: Top-Down-Shooter where you play as an old wizard and attempt to survive endless hordes of enemies and bosses.

NEW!

Dark Mage Boss:

  • Dark Mage can now attack.
  • Dark Mage health buffed to 30.

Potential Future Updates:

  • Music / Sound Effects
  • More Enemies / Bosses
  • More Waves
  • More Book Power-Ups
  • Hard-Mode?

Inspiration: Sorcerer Shootout

Link to YouTube video of Sorcerer Shootout: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AiJfHTdw9DQ

Notes: This is my first game and is still under progress of being made. I know some of my sprites are still similar to the ones in Sorcerer Shootout but, I am working to slowly replace everything and make it my own. 

If you find anything that doesn't work or have ideas you'd like to share, leave a comment down below.

I hope you enjoy!
